amendment.description: Amendment adds language that provides a Jones Act waiver to the vessel PRIDE OF MANY and added language expressing the sense of Congress regarding oil spill response actions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make technical changes and express the sense of the Congress that the President should issue guidelines regarding oil spill response actions to clarify that a person who is not responsible for the spill yet takes action to prevent the effects of it shall not be held liable for the violation of fish and wildlife laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
